EmailTemplate.subject: MBO Partners / {{lead.Full Name:default=}}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {{lead.First Name:default=future associate}},
I hope you are doing well. I wanted to touch base and see how the contract search is going?
We have a number of consultant resources that we continually update that you may find helpful. You may find them here: http://www.mbopartners.com/resources/all <http://link.mbopartners.com/ol/0xEFfZmddHNcoUZ1%5Fu%2DNb%5Fmgz3iQN8jlq65yDbq2lMIt3kF6L7yJPEjr1YIDT8Z0dufDUUQVGpQ81B5QG%5FqUboQVqtVaBkC7VHX8j6yceoRKLOQ12dl17an49VQsvduqvEX1W0MFcEVvfCilcasZszH0MacSBjqzwHL7EaY6sRwhkYcJ74WRXuPkwn6F72jxxj2hAHxpyeW682a2KpFTluZTkVsBvHwSfvjY2y3KwbF8vRYD2%2DZ130lkzMlQNPBluQSwZg6z5oLOVut3F7%2DwwrOqv64fZh892rYcT2HWHW6ZP6O%2DWypy%5FyGZrA0SKxJNfjdsLrY6uzWNtX5XUfI0Z33pxW9lgg%2C%2C/1gwVMM7QNEZOogl76fOJI7v5kTDSadartLEyG%5FL13dos2k1tPe3DNB7ig8duCJ05OLuGNCM7KZpCwlx2KPSzLdMFqNdbAWyxVzXui6vuRYlacKZn8ORZxv339XUunOiRi3X5LmYPTERrIVW5LOwE>. In addition, if you have any suggestions for new resources that might help other consultants - please let us know!
I look forward to hearing from you.
Best regards,
{{lead.EM FName:default=Sara}} {{lead.EM LName:default=Conde}} Consultant Services Advisor
MBO Partners
t: {{lead.EM Phone:default=703-793-6028}} f: 703-793-6070 e: {{lead.EM Email:default=sconde@mbopartners.com}} w: www.mbopartners.com <http://www.mbopartners.com/>
